# Security Policy

## Supported versions

Laeyrd is under active development. The latest release is the one that receives fixes.

## Reporting a vulnerability

If you discover a security issue, **please do not open a public issue**.

Instead, email: your-email@example.com

Include:

- Description of the issue
- Steps to reproduce
- Expected impact

Iâ€™ll aim to respond within a reasonable time and coordinate a fix + release.
